scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=development&& set DEBUG=node-api:* && pm2 start ./bin/www --name node-api-dev
scripts.prod-centos: export NODE_ENV=production&& set DEBUG=node-api:* && pm2 start ./bin/www -i max --name node-api-centos-prod
scripts.dev-pm2-single-thread: export NODE_ENV=development&& export DEBUG=node-api:* && pm2 start ./bin/www --name node-api-centos
scripts.dev-pm2-full-core: export NODE_ENV=development&& export DEBUG=node-api:* && pm2 start ./bin/www -i max --name node-api-centos
scripts.dev-pm2-full-core-win: set NODE_ENV=development&& set DEBUG=node-api:* && pm2 start ./bin/www -i max --name node-api-win
scripts.prod-pm2-full-core-win: set NODE_ENV=production&& set DEBUG=node-api:* && pm2 start ./bin/www -i 2 --name node-api-win
